title: Is the chat service down for anyone else?

replies.body: I don't see that there were any server issues.  In case cases do arise, you can use our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) to stay updated.  Let me know if you still have any issues!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=aOe6hBdv,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-09-23T17:18:50.310+0000)
>
> I don't see that there were any server issues.  In case cases do arise, you can use our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) to stay updated.  Let me know if you still have any issues!

It corrected itself after the maintenance I guess, thanks though.
after waiting an hour and 3 relogins  the chat is back!  {{champion:83}}

yep same here.
Windows just did a major update, could this be related?
Me can't see friends just says connecting
